name: part_007
file: tmp_【#戌神ころね生誕祭2021】久しぶりの３Ｄライブ！？今年もいっぱいおめでとうをありがとう！【戌神ころね⧸ホロライブ】 [2l3i7MulCgs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone continues her performance of 'Happy Synthesizer'.
A brief transition period between songs.

subtitles.original: お似合いね、嘘ついてごめんね
subtitles.english: Looks good on you, sorry for lying

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ
subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer

subtitles.original: 君の胸の奥まで
subtitles.english: Reaching deep into your heart

subtitles.original: 届くようなメロディ奏でるよ
subtitles.english: A melody that reaches you, I'll play it

subtitles.original: つまらない建前や
subtitles.english: Boring pretenses

subtitles.original: 嫌なこと全部
subtitles.english: And all the bad things

subtitles.original: 消してあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll erase them for you

subtitles.original: この音で
subtitles.english: With this sound

subtitles.original: 何の取り柄もない
subtitles.english: I have no special talents

subtitles.original: 僕にただ一つ
subtitles.english: There's just one thing I can do

subtitles.original: 少しだけできること
subtitles.english: Just a little bit

subtitles.original: 心踊らせる
subtitles.english: Making your heart dance

subtitles.original: 飾らない言葉
subtitles.english: With unadorned words

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll tell you with electronic sounds

subtitles.original: 好きになること理屈なんかじゃなくて
subtitles.english: Falling in love isn't about logic

subtitles.original: こじつけなんていらないんじゃない?
subtitles.english: Explanations aren't needed, right?

subtitles.original: 時代のせいと諦めたらそこまで
subtitles.english: If you blame the times and give up, that's where it ends

subtitles.original: 踏み出さなくちゃ何も始まらない
subtitles.english: You've got to take a step or nothing will start

subtitles.original: ごめんね、夜遅く寝てるところだったでしょう
subtitles.english: Sorry it's so late, you were probably sleeping

subtitles.original: 驚いた私も駆け出そうとしてた
subtitles.english: Surprised, I was also about to run off

subtitles.original: 心の裏側をくすぐられているような
subtitles.english: Feels like the back of my heart is being tickled

subtitles.original: 響きあう二人に幸せな音を
subtitles.english: A happy sound to the two of us resonating

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ ほら楽しくなるよ
subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer, look, it's getting fun

subtitles.original: 涙拭くメロディ奏でるよ
subtitles.english: A melody to wipe away tears, I'll play it

subtitles.original: 強がらなくたっていいんじゃない別に
subtitles.english: You don't have to act tough, it's fine, really

subtitles.original: 自分に素直になればいい
subtitles.english: If you just stay true to yourself, it'll be okay

subtitles.original: 何の取り柄もない僕にただ一つ
subtitles.english: I have no special talents, there's just one thing

subtitles.original: 少しだけできること
subtitles.english: I can do just a little bit

subtitles.original: ちょっと照れるような単純な気持ち
subtitles.english: A bit embarrassing, simple feelings

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll tell you with electronic sounds

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ 君の胸の奥まで
subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer, deep into your heart

subtitles.english: A melody that reaches you, I'll play it

subtitles.original: つまらない建前や嫌なこと全部
subtitles.english: Boring pretenses and all the bad things

subtitles.english: I'll erase them for you with this sound

subtitles.english: I have no special talents, there's just one thing

subtitles.english: I can do just a little bit

subtitles.original: 心踊らせる飾らない言葉
subtitles.english: Unadorned words that make your heart dance

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll tell you with electronic sounds

subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer, look, it's getting fun

subtitles.english: A melody to wipe away tears, I'll play it

subtitles.english: You don't have to act tough, it's fine, really

subtitles.english: If you just stay true to yourself, it'll be okay

subtitles.english: I have no special talents, there's just one thing

subtitles.original: 少しだけできること
subtitles.english: I can do just a little bit

subtitles.original: ちょっと照れるような単純な気持ち
subtitles.english: A bit embarrassing, simple feelings

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll tell you with electronic sounds

subtitles.original: せーの
subtitles.english: One, two...

subtitles.original: でもそんなんじゃダメ
subtitles.english: But that's no good

subtitles.original:
恋愛サーキュレーション
作詞 meg rock ・ 作曲 神前 暁
subtitles.english:
Ren'ai Circulation
Lyrics: meg rock / Composition: Satoru Kosaki

subtitles.original: もうそんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, that's enough already

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ もっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart is evolving, more and more

subtitles.original: 言葉にすれば消えちゃう関係なら
subtitles.english: If it's a relationship that vanishes when worded

subtitles.original: 言葉を消せばいいやって思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought I should just erase the words

subtitles.original: 恐れてた
subtitles.english: I was afraid

subtitles.original: だけどあれ?
subtitles.english: But wait...

subtitles.original: なんか違うかも
subtitles.english: Something might be different

subtitles.original: 千里の道も一歩から
subtitles.english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with one step

subtitles.original: 石のように固いそんな意志で
subtitles.english: With a will as hard as a stone

subtitles.original: 塵も積もればやまとなでしこ?
subtitles.english: If dust piles up, it becomes a Yamato Nadeshiko?

subtitles.original: 「し」抜きで、いや死ぬ気で!
subtitles.english: Without the 'shi', no, with my life on the line!

subtitles.original: ふわふわり ふわふわる
subtitles.english: Fluffy, fluffy

subtitles.original: あなたが名前を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Just you calling my name

subtitles.original: それだけで宙に浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Makes me float in the air

subtitles.original: ふわふわる ふわふわり
subtitles.english: Fluffy, fluffy

subtitles.original: あなたが笑っている
subtitles.english: Just you laughing

subtitles.original: それだけで笑顔になる
subtitles.english: Makes me smile too

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you God, even if it's a prank of fate

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが幸せなの
subtitles.english: The fact that we met makes me happy

subtitles.original: でもそんなんじゃダメ
subtitles.english: But that's no good

subtitles.original: もうそんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, that's enough already

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ もっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart is evolving, more and more

subtitles.original: そうそんなんじゃやだ
subtitles.english: Yeah, I don't like that

subtitles.original: ねぇそんなんじゃもっと
subtitles.english: Hey, that's not enough

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ててね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: Keep looking at me, forever and ever
